column6: seven suspects were arrested by law enforcement officers at Ma Heng’s guesthouse in Prey Krolanh village
column9: Kandal province. They were detained for pretending to be Buddhist monks
column10: and drug use. One of the men was driving the six others around.------The suspects were from Kampot and Battambang provinces.------According to a suspect’s confession
column11: they had been fraudulently collecting alms from people in Thnol market.------The seven suspects were found to have been using drugs in this case
column12: and police have created a case to follow legal procedure. ------POST NEWS
